oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Performance Assessment of Storage Polices of the Vaigai Reservoir Using a Simulation Model
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NIRMALA, J
ARUNKUMAR, R
JOTHIPRAKASH, V
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Simulation model; performance assessment; storage-based operational policy; Vaigai reservoir system; India
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A comprehensive simulation model assesses the performance of the storage based operating policies of the Vaigai reservoir system, Tamil Nadu, India. The model first uses the historical inflow data and then inflow data generated through an artificial neural network (ANN) model. The modeled releases are then compared with the actual ones. It is found that the existing storage based policies were violated within the year but not on an annual basis, except in the recent past, when annual deficits occur due to inadequate water availability from the upstream reservoir.
